column4: Yes  <mr_lou>. I've got the same error when trying to install Ubuntu 11.04. What should I Do?
Does upgrading to Ubuntu 11.10 solve my problem?
<mr_lou>Does upgrading to Ubuntu 11.10 solve my problem?
I have a netbook (Asus 1215N) and i want to install ubuntu 11.04 on it (alongside windows 7 HP preinstalled)
somebody help me with this fucking error
the error is:(initramfs) Unable to find a medium containing a live file system
when I want to install it, this message appears
instead of bothering with a bunch of !commands at you, I'll give you the run down: If nobody's responded, nobody awake knows.
you mean nobody knows the answer here?
the person who knows may not be awake / active in the channel. Or, they may not be looking at the window.
I use the minimal on my older servers, it deals with all sorts of screwups of hardware.
visit the link provided by the bot in your browser.
Now superglue the bad port shut! :)
